item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 欧洲利率走低，准备迎接另一个特朗普时代
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普第二次入主白宫后，欧洲各国央行坚决转向鸽派，以帮助各经济体抵御更多干扰。【原文：Europe’s central banks are taking a determined dovish turn to aid economies bracing for more disruption from Donald Trump’s second stint in the White House.】

item.title: 苹果公司即将为 iPhone 和家用设备改用自制蓝牙和 Wi-Fi 芯片
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）雄心勃勃地计划为其设备制造内部组件，包括从明年开始改用国产芯片进行蓝牙和 Wi-Fi 连接，此举将取代目前由 Broadcom Inc.【原文：Apple Inc.’s ambitious plan to create in-house components for its devices will include switching to a homegrown chip for Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connections starting next year, a move that will replace some parts currently provided by Broadcom Inc.】

item.title: 顶级经济学家称中国未来几年将增长 3%-4% 左右
item.description: 一位著名的中国经济学家表示，中国经济的增长速度可能比官方数据显示的要慢，未来几年大约 3% 到 4% 的扩张速度可能是一个现实的前景。【原文：China’s economy likely grows slower than official figures suggest, and a rate of expansion of around 3% to 4% is probably a realistic outlook for the coming years, according to a prominent Chinese economist.】

item.title: ServiceTitan 股价飙升 42%，市场首现大片效应
item.description: 在这家住宅和商业维修软件公司募集到 6.248 亿美元资金后，ServiceTitan Inc.【原文：ServiceTitan Inc. shares opened 42% above their initial public offering price after the residential and commercial repair software company raised $624.8 million.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数创纪录涨势出现裂痕，多数股票被排除在外
item.description: 在股市屡创新高的背后，是一些华尔街策略师担忧的趋势：支撑股市上涨的股票越来越少。【原文：Beneath a stock market that goes from one record to the next lies a concerning trend for some Wall Street strategists: Fewer stocks are buttressing the advance.】

item.title: 英国钞票印刷商德拉鲁因股权出售谈判而跃跃欲试
item.description: De La Rue Plc 一跃创下近三年来的最高水平，因为这家英国货币印刷商表示，它正在商谈出售该公司的股份。【原文：De La Rue Plc jumped to hit the highest level in almost three years after the British currency printer said it is in talks to sell a stake in the business.】

item.title: Grifols 通过特殊债券条款为布鲁克菲尔德敞开大门
item.description: Grifols SA 在其 13 亿欧元（14 亿美元）的私募债务中加入了一项条款，允许布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）提前为这笔交易进行再融资；这表明这家西班牙制药商为私募股权公司的再次接触敞开了大门。【原文：Grifols SA has included a term in its €1.3 billion ($1.4 billion) private debt placement that would allow Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. to refinance the deal early — a sign the Spanish drugmaker is leaving the door open for the private equity firm to make another approach.】

item.title: 乌克兰钢铁制造商停止顿涅茨克煤矿运营
item.description: 乌克兰最大的钢铁制造商 Metinvest BV 已停止了顿涅茨克州波克罗夫斯克附近煤炭生产基地的运营，因为该镇已成为近几个月来与俄罗斯军队发生的最激烈战斗的中心。【原文：Ukraine’s biggest steelmaker, Metinvest BV, has halted operations at its coal production site near Pokrovsk in the Donetsk region, as the town becomes the epicenter of the fiercest fighting with Russian troops in recent months.】

item.title: 英特尔称分拆公司是个未决问题
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.首席财务官戴夫-津斯纳（Dave Zinsner）说，正式分离公司的工厂和产品开发部门是一个未决问题，将由这家芯片制造商的下一任领导人来决定。【原文：Intel Corp. Chief Financial Officer Dave Zinsner said that a formal separation of the company’s factory and product-development divisions is an open question that will be decided by the chipmaker’s next leader.】

item.title: Klarna 一年前停止所有招聘，用人工智能取代工人
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 首席执行官塞巴斯蒂安-西米亚特考夫斯基（Sebastian Siemiatkowski）表示，由于公司投资了人工智能，全公司数百名员工的工作都由人工智能完成，因此公司在一年前就停止了招聘。【原文：Klarna Group Plc Chief Executive Officer Sebastian Siemiatkowski said his company was able to stop hiring a year ago as it invested in artificial intelligence that’s doing the work of hundreds of staff across the firm.】

item.title: 美国家庭财富因股票价值上升而创纪录
item.description: 在总统大选前股市大涨的推动下，美国家庭财富在第三季度创下新纪录。【原文：US household wealth rose to a fresh record in the third quarter, fueled by a stock-market rally ahead of the presidential election.】

item.title: 巴克莱预计泰晤士股票投资者将获得 5.1% 的回报率
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）周四预测，泰晤士水务公司的股票投资者在未来五年内将可能获得 5.1% 的回报。【原文：Equity investors in Thames Water will likely get a return of 5.1% over the next five years, according to forecasts by Barclays Plc Thursday.】

item.title: 前加拿大央行官员认为关键利率很快将达到 2.75
item.description: 前加拿大央行副行长保罗-博德里（Paul Beaudry）预计，政策制定者将下调关键利率，直至至少达到 2.75%，而在此之后的路径则不太明确。【原文：Former Bank of Canada Deputy Governor Paul Beaudry expects policymakers to cut their key interest rate until it hits at least 2.75%, with the path beyond that point less clear.】

item.title: 基辅指认俄罗斯影子石油舰队中的油轮
item.description: 乌克兰确认了 238 艘油轮，称这些油轮属于一支影子船队，俄罗斯正利用这支船队将其石油和燃料运往世界各地。【原文：Ukraine identified 238 tankers it said belong to a shadow fleet of ships that Russia is using to keep its oil and fuels moving around the world — with a view to western authorities sanctioning the carriers.】

item.title: 丹麦降息四分之一个百分点以维护货币联系汇率制
item.description: 丹麦央行紧随欧洲央行，降息四分之一个百分点，以捍卫克朗与共同货币挂钩的地位。【原文：Denmark’s central bank followed its European counterpart with a quarter-point interest-rate cut to defend the krone’s peg to the common currency.】

item.title: 南非希望二十国集团重新考虑穷国的债务成本
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）说，南非希望 20 国集团重新评估其四年前建立的穷国债务重组体系，因为该体系没有考虑到穷国的全部负担。【原文：South Africa wants the Group of 20 to reassess the system it set up four years ago to restructure poor nations’ debt because it doesn’t consider the full extent of their burdens, Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said.】

item.title: 谷歌与三星合作推出耳机，向苹果和 Meta 发起挑战
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司和三星电子公司共同宣布进军混合现实市场，推出新的操作系统和头戴式耳机，以挑战苹果公司和Meta Platforms公司的设备。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled a joint push into the mixed-reality market, introducing a new operating system and headset in a bid to challenge devices from Apple Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: Blackstone 牵头为 Odevo 提供 14 亿美元的私人信贷包
item.description: 知情人士称，Ares Management Corp. 和 Blackstone Inc. 将联手为瑞典物业管理公司 Odevo AB 提供价值 14.3 亿美元的一揽子私人信用贷款。【原文：Ares Management Corp. and Blackstone Inc. are joining forces to provide a $1.43 billion-equivalent private credit loan package for Swedish property manager Odevo AB, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普称杰夫-贝索斯将于下周与他会面
item.description: 亚马逊创始人杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）将于下周与唐纳德-特朗普会面，这位当选总统周四表示，在他重返白宫之前，他将与科技巨头，包括与美国政府有大量合同的科技巨头进行接触。【原文：Amazon founder Jeff Bezos is meeting with Donald Trump next week, the president-elect said Thursday, highlighting his contacts with tech titans, including those with extensive contracts with the US government, in the run-up to his return to the White House.】

item.title: 英国对冲基金创始人因在丹麦骗税 13 亿美元而入狱
item.description: 英国对冲基金交易员桑杰-沙阿（Sanjay Shah）因策划数十亿美元的税务骗局被丹麦法官判处 12 年有期徒刑，这是迄今为止欧洲规模庞大的 "Cum-Ex "交易丑闻中判处的最重刑罚。【原文：British hedge fund trader Sanjay Shah was sentenced to 12 years in prison by Danish judges for orchestrating a billion-dollar tax scam, the heaviest jail term handed down so far in Europe’s sprawling Cum-Ex trading scandal.】

item.title: 拉加德痛斥欧洲 "自作自受 "的政治不确定性
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲动荡的政治背景笼罩着法兰克福官员周四做出的货币政策决定。【原文：Europe’s tumultuous political backdrop loomed over the monetary policy decision taken by officials in Frankfurt on Thursday, according to Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 俄罗斯资金在海外堆积，贸易支付陷入困境
item.description: 由于美国对克里姆林宫仍然友好的国家的金融机构施加压力，导致国际贸易结算日益拖延，俄罗斯的出口收益正在国外积累。【原文：Proceeds from Russian exports are accumulating abroad due to increasing delays in international trade settlements caused by US pressure on financial institutions in countries that remain friendly to the Kremlin.】

item.title: 美国政府问责局称，特朗普 2020 年加快五角大楼采购速度的努力没有成功
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在上届总统任期结束时提出了一系列改革措施，旨在简化国防部开发和购买新武器的繁琐而昂贵的程序。【原文：Donald Trump ended his previous term as president with a set of changes billed as streamlining the Defense Department’s cumbersome and costly procedures to develop and buy new weapons.】

item.title: 12 亿加元未完工大厦的贷款人将自己建造大厦
item.description: 多伦多一栋建了一半的 85 层公寓楼的贷款人将雇用一家当地开发商来完成建设，因为在试图出售该项目时，只有一个投标人。【原文：Lenders to a half-built, 85-story Toronto condo tower will hire a local developer to finish construction after an attempt to sell the project elicited only one bidder.】

item.title: Pimco 就银行风险转移的潜在 "隐患 "发出警告
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is urging caution on the booming market for synthetic risk transfers, an increasingly popular tool used by banks to offload risk and boost their lending capacity.】

item.title: 据说埃克萨罗公司正在讨论收购奇希锰矿的事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）已与南非最大的锰矿之一的所有者就收购该资产举行了会谈，因为这家煤炭生产商正寻求实现业务多元化。【原文：Exxaro Resources Ltd. has held talks with the owner of one of South Africa’s largest manganese mines about buying the asset, as the coal producer seeks to diversify its business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊遭黑客攻击后一年内暂停推出微软办公软件
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已将微软公司基于云计算的 Office 套件的部署推迟了一年，因为两家公司正在努力解决亚马逊对捆绑电子邮件和生产力软件安全性的担忧。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has delayed the deployment of Microsoft Corp.’s cloud-based Office suite for a year as the two companies work to resolve Amazon concerns about the security of the bundle of email and productivity software.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟将有线电视资产与流媒体业务分开
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is changing its corporate structure and creating separate divisions for its cable and streaming businesses.】
